title: Self-Directed Learning Program for Strengthening Instructional Design Capabilities in Higher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Instructional design principles and foundational knowledge in language education
context.additional_context: A customized program for pre-service and in-service elementary teachers to systematically acquire higher education instructional design competencies.

learning_goals: Learners can explain ten instructional design competency elements (collaboration, communication, problem-solving, etc.) suitable for higher education.
Learners can complete instructional design projects (course planning documents) using smartphone-based tools.
Learners can develop personalized learning plans based on self-assessment results of their competencies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
